PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE { ?s dcterms:accrualPeriodicity <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/frequency/UNKNOWN> .
        ?s dcterms:accrualPeriodicity <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/frequency/NEVER> .
		?s dcterms:accrualPeriodicity <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/frequency/IRREG> }
WHERE { ?s dcterms:accrualPeriodicity <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/frequency/UNKNOWN> .
        ?s dcterms:accrualPeriodicity <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/frequency/NEVER> .
		?s dcterms:accrualPeriodicity <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/frequency/IRREG> }
